bio.title: My Story
bio.paragraph1: I'm a Senior Software Engineer with over 5 years of experience in developing web applications and backend systems. I'm passionate about creating efficient and scalable technical solutions.
bio.paragraph2: Throughout my career, I've worked with various technologies, from Java and Spring Boot to modern frontend frameworks. I'm always looking for opportunities to learn and apply the latest technologies.
bio.paragraph3: Besides software development, I'm passionate about sharing knowledge and mentoring young developers. I believe that sharing knowledge helps the community grow stronger.

sourceSelector.title: Select Quiz
sourceSelector.subtitle: Choose from predefined sources, enter a URL, or paste JSON directly
sourceSelector.urlLabel: URL of JSON file containing questions:
sourceSelector.formatDescUrl: JSON file from URL must have an array structure with question objects in the following format:
sourceSelector.formatDescJson: JSON must have an array structure with question objects in the following format:
sourceSelector.reqOptions: The options field must be an array of objects
sourceSelector.reqOptionFields: Each option must have text and isCorrect
sourceSelector.reqOneCorrect: Only one option should have isCorrect: true
sourceSelector.noQuizzesDesc: No quizzes found from data source.
sourceSelector.customUrlDesc: Enter URL of JSON file containing quiz questions
sourceSelector.customJsonDesc: Paste JSON content containing questions directly
